metadata.title: USN-2648-1 -- Aptdaemon vulnerability
metadata.description: Tavis Ormandy discovered that Aptdeamon incorrectly handled the simulate dbus method. A local attacker could use this issue to possibly expose sensitive information, or perform other file access as the root user.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-2648-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  python3-aptdaemon.gtk3widgets - 1.1.1-1ubuntu5.2 aptdaemon - 1.1.1-1ubuntu5.2 python-aptdaemon-gtk - 1.1.1-1ubuntu5.2 python3-aptdaemon.test - 1.1.1-1ubuntu5.2 python-aptdaemon - 1.1.1-1ubuntu5.2 python-aptdaemon.gtkwidgets - 1.1.1-1ubuntu5.2 aptdaemon-data - 1.1.1-1ubuntu5.2 python3-aptdaemon.pkcompat - 1.1.1-1ubuntu5.2 python-aptdaemon.gtk3widgets - 1.1.1-1ubuntu5.2 python3-aptdaemon - 1.1.1-1ubuntu5.2 No subscription required
